Series 7

The BMW 7 Series is a full-size luxury sedan manufactured and marketed by the German automaker BMW since 1977. [1] It is the successor to the BMW E3 “New Six” sedan and is now in its seventh generation.. The 7 Series is BMW’s flagship car and is only available in a sedan bodystyle (including long wheelbase and limousine models). It traditionally introduces technologies and exterior design …

  • BMW M760e xDrive
  • BMW i7 Saloon
